page.title: 02SHOPS IN DURNESS
page.content: In Durness there are three shops. Two of them are general merchants, the other one is a gift shop. The Mace shop stocks some clothing as well as food. It also has the Post Office in it. The other shop,Mather's, is an old-fashioned grocers shop. The gift shop sells souveniers,hand knitting, rugs, books and wool. Until about 50 years ago the deliveries to Durness came by steamer to Portnacon or Rispond. The deliveries were then taken to the shops by horse and cart. Today deliveries are by lorry from Inverness or Wick. For most non-food items many people use mail order catalogues or make an occasional trip to Inverness or Thurso.
